mapper.select: SELECT U.IDX AS idx, U.USER_TYPE_IDX AS userTypeIdx, UT.NAME AS userTypeName, U.ID AS id, U.EMAIL AS email, U.PASSWORD AS password, U.NAME AS name, U.NICKNAME AS nickname, U.BIRTH_DATE AS birthDate, U.GENDER AS gender, U.TEL AS tel, U.ZIP_CODE AS zipCode, U.ADDRESS AS address, U.ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail, U.POINT AS point, U.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, U.UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, U.LAST_LOGIN_AT AS lastLoginAt, U.WITHDRAWN_AT AS withdrawnAt, U.STATUS AS status, U.LOCKED AS locked, U.LOCK_COUNT AS lockCount, U.LOCKED_AT AS lockedAt FROM USERS U JOIN USER_TYPES UT ON U.USER_TYPE_IDX = UT.IDX WHERE U.ID = #{id}

SELECT S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX AS shelterTypeIdx, ST.NAME AS shelterTypeName, S.SHELTER_TEL AS shelterTel, S.SHELTER_NAME AS shelterName, S.SHELTER_PERSON_NAME AS shelterPersonName, S.SHELTER_ZIP_CODE AS shelterZipCode, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS AS shelterAddress, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS_DETAIL AS shelterAddressDetail, S.SHELTER_EMAIL AS shelterEmail, S.SHELTER_DESCRIPTION AS shelterDescription, S.SHELTER_BUSINESS_NUMBER AS shelterBusinessNumber, S.SHELTER_BUSINESS_FILE AS shelterBusinessFile FROM SHELTERS S LEFT JOIN SHELTER_TYPES ST ON S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX = ST.IDX WHERE S.USER_IDX = #{idx}
SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND STATUS = 1
